post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Hi ,
If this role is not for you, I was hoping to network with you to see if there is anyone you might know. Please see the details below on the role that I am currently pursuing for my client: If you are interested please attach an updated resume.
Intermediate QA - Toronto - Contract - (skills) - 3-5 years of experience in testing code/apps on the web. Medium level experience with solid knowledge of the financial testing (stock data). Ability to write project testing related documentation. Must have experience with Backend load testing and writing automated test scripts. Experience with HTML/CSS/Javascript (at least to the point of figuring out the obvious issues). Ability to write or interpret use cases and test scripts. Some programming and E-commerce experience a huge asset. Shell script, Unix, Linux, SQL and Oracle background is an asset.
Regards, Ed Rix Resource Planning Watercrest Business Technology Solutions TF: 1-888-244-7550 ext.110 ed@watercrest.net www.watercrest.net
post.title: Intermediate QA, Cont', Toronto
